echo "Welcome to Mehmet Akif's Linux!"
echo
echo " * $LOGNAME on MadLinux."

clear
printf '%s\n\n%s on MadLinux.\nUsing %s\n\n%s\n\n' \

cat <<EoF
Welcome to Mehmet Akif's Linux!

$LOGNAME on MadLinux.
Using $(basename $(tty))

EoF

cat <<EoF
Welcome to Mehmet Akif's Linux!

$USER on MadLinux.
Using "${TTY#/dev/}"

"Type 'startx' to start graphical user interface."
EoF
